name: foundry-no-dice-no-stress
description: Removes the stress of rolling dice in vtt foundry

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/chrome-extension dist/firefox-extension && esbuild chrome-extension/background.ts --bundle --platform=browser --outdir=dist/chrome-extension && esbuild firefox-extension/background.ts --bundle --platform=browser --outdir=dist/firefox-extension && cp chrome-extension/manifest.json dist/chrome-extension/ && cp firefox-extension/manifest.json dist/firefox-extension/
